dialogue: I'm getting writer's block trying to come up with your goals for the year.
We both know I'll ignore the goals and work on whatever you assign to me.
How will I know if you do a good job if you don't have goals?
You'll compare your lack of knowledge about what I did to the goals you imagine you might have created if you could have seen the future.
Then you'll give me an average raise just like everyone else who didn't invent nuclear fusion.
It's better to not over-think these things.
